name: twelve - hardest puzzle
description:
New endless puzzle game from maker of Joinz.

Twelve is a tiny puzzle game based on movable numbers on a grid. Match the same numbers and grow them. Although it may seem easy to reach for twelve, you need develop special tactics to manage the paths.

Can you reach for twelve?

App Store : https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/twelve-hardest-puzzle/id931004233

Google Play : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.com.gamebrain.twelve
